name: MEEET
introduce: MEEET is a Web3 Farm Game with inbuilt Game-Fi and Social-Fi elements. In MEEET, players with NFT farmers can complete tasks by planting, harvesting, feeding animals, processing products in factories and selling products to earn currency. These currency can either be used in-game, or cashed out for profit. MEEET protocol is a developed social network graph serving the gaming industry vertically, creating personal gaming profiles (including game assets, game hours, etc.), as well as the user's social relationships with others' games, and with the entire information completely on the chain. It forms a social network graph that can be inserted by any application controlled by the user.
